00003 // Bitmap.h : Converts 8- 16- or 32-bit bitmap formats to a DirectDraw surface
00004 //
00005 // Part of the GameCode Application
00006 //
00007 // GameCode is the sample application that encapsulates much of the source code
00008 // discussed in "Game Coding Complete" by Mike McShaffry, published by
00009 // Paraglyph Press. ISBN: 1-932111-75-1

00039 // Bitmap
00041 
00042 class Bitmap
00043 {
00044 public:
00045 
00046         // Describes the pixel format of destination for conversion
00047         enum PixelFormat
00048         {
00049                 PIXELFORMAT_RGB_16_565,
00050                 PIXELFORMAT_RGB_16_555,
00051                 PIXELFORMAT_RGB_32,
00052                 PIXELFORMAT_16,         // Non-optimal - (non RGB formats)
00053                 PIXELFORMAT_32,         // i.e. BGR...
00054                 PIXELFORMAT_UNKNOWN
00055         };
00056 
00057         static const char* MakeSingleBitmap(const char* inputdata, int startFrame, int numFrames, int totalFrames, int *datasize );
00058 
00059         // Make surface from bitmap data
00060         static bool FillSurfaceFromBitmap( const char* pBMPHeader, DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, BYTE** pExtra );
00061 
00062         // Retrieves a single frame out of an IPAC file, decoding RLE if necessary,
00063         // as well as DWORD aligning the new bitmap
00064         static int GetFrameSize( const char* inputdata, int iFrame );
00065         static void GetSingleFrame( const char* inputdata, int iFrame, char* destbuffer, int datasize );
00066 
00067         // Get information from bitmap
00068         static void GetBitmapInfo(const char *inputData, int &width, int &height, int &bpp );
00069         static void GetBitmapBits(const char *inputData, const char** bits );
00070 
00071         // RLE
00072         static long GetRLEBitSize(const char* inputdata);
00073 
00074 private:
00075 
00076         // Sets the pixel format for conversion purposes
00077         static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(LPDDPIXELFORMAT pixelformat);
00078         
00079         // 8 bit conversion helper
00080         static bool GeneratePaletteConversionTable( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmap, BYTE** table );
00081         
00082         // RLE
00083         static void DecodeRLEBits(const char* inputdata, char* outputdata);
00084         
00085         // Standard copy, no conversion needed
00086         static bool CopyBitmapBits( const char* pBMPHeader, DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc );
00087         
00088 public:
00089 
00090         // =============
00091         // 8 bit sources
00092         // =============
00093         
00094         static bool ConvertBitmap_8( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight, BYTE* pExtra );
00095 
00096         // ==============
00097         // 16 bit sources
00098         // ==============
00099 
00100 #ifdef _555_SOURCES
00101         // 555 sources
00102         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_555_16_555_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00103         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_555_16_565_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00104         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_555_32_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00105 #else
00106         // 565 sources
00107         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_565_16_555_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00108         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_565_16_565_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00109         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_565_32_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00110 #endif
00111 
00112         // ==============
00113         // 24 bit sources
00114         // ==============
00115         
00116         static bool ConvertBitmap_24_16_555_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00117         static bool ConvertBitmap_24_16_565_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00118         static bool ConvertBitmap_24_32_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00119

00125         static bool ConvertBitmap_32_16_565_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00126         static bool ConvertBitmap_32_32_RGB( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00127

00135         static bool ConvertBitmap_16_555_32_XXX( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
00136 #else

00147         static bool ConvertBitmap_24_32_XXX( DDSURFACEDESC2* pDesc, const char* bitmapBits, int iBitmapWidth, int iBitmapHeight );
